function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher infection rates, and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Public education, strict enforcement, and community engagement","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology, and air filtration systems","People":"General public, individuals in high-risk groups, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and community organizations"}]}
